unnormalised: Aiyyo, tax filing is such a headache, no? Last date is 31/07, so better prepone all your plans. I used ClearTax last time, seemed ok. My refund was only Rs. 2500, though, so not sure if it's worth the effort, LOL. Gotta submit Form 16 also; my PAN is linked already so hopefully, it's easy-peasy. My CA said Section 80C is my best friend.
